personal.title: 2023 - Procedural Climb Animation in Unreal Engine
personal.description: Climb mechanics using 1 idle hanging pose, fully procedural grip position calculation, control rig and ik solver. I calculate hand, feet and knee control positions in code and feed those values into control rig through the ABP, which are then fed into a full body ik solver.

personal.title: 2023 - Climb Animation in Unreal Engine
personal.description: Animation and line trace based climb mechanics. Implemented a custom ABP state machine and a custom movement mode for the movement component.

work.title: 2021: Musicographics
work.description:
Musicographics is a graphical music composition tool that was developed together with a musician and architect Ali Murat Cengiz. It's fully written in Unity. It supports loading audio samples, laying out 2D maps and orchestrating it with different instruments, and saving your compositions. The end result is a musical experience that might also resemble underground map of a city.
Website: www.musicographics.com
Used technologies: Unity

work.title: 2018: Turkish Music To Jazz
work.description:
Worked on the development of the Turkish Language to Jazz Music project for one of the biggest banks in Turkey, Akbank.
What this project achieves is that it takes a text in Turkish language as input. The text is analyzed linguistically and turned into a rhythmical structure, which in turn is turned into randomly generated jazz tune using some configurable parameters and rules.
My role: Development of the language parsing and music generation methods.
Used technologies: JS/Node.js, midi generation plugins & samples
